#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #frontenddeveloper #frontend

–ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥ –∏ –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞: –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞

–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–∞

–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–Ω–∞—è, –¥–∞–ª–µ–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –∑–∞–∫–ª—é—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–∞ —Å –±–æ–Ω—É—Å–∞–º–∏ –∑–∞ —Ä–∞–∑–≤–∏—Ç–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏ (–∏—Å–ø—ã—Ç–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Å—Ä–æ–∫ - 2 –º–µ—Å—è—Ü–∞)

–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: –æ—Ç 90 000 –¥–æ 130 000 —Ä—É–±.

–û–ø–∏—Å–∞–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏: –†–ê–ó–†–ê–ë–û–¢–ö–ê –ò–ù–¢–ï–†–ù–ï–¢  –ü–õ–ê–¢–§–û–†–ú–´ –î–õ–Ø –°–û–ó–î–ê–ù–ò–Ø –ö–û–ú–ü–¨–Æ–¢–ï–†–ù–û–ô –ì–†–ê–§–ò–ö–ò –î–õ–Ø –ò–ì–† –ò –°–ü–ï–¶–≠–§–§–ï–ö–¢–û–í –í –ö–ò–ù–û (cg-doo.com)

–¢—Ä–µ–±—É–µ–º—ã–π –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: 2‚Äì5 –ª–µ—Ç

–ù–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ –Ω–∞–≤—ã–∫–∏:
- —É–≤–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ JavaScript, React / Redux, HTML5, CSS3
- –æ–ø—ã—Ç –∫–æ–º–º–µ—Ä—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º React.JS, Redux –æ—Ç –≥–æ–¥–∞
- –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å ES6
- –∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∞–Ω–≥–ª–∏–π—Å–∫–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞ —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ–∫—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏

–ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º:
- –æ–ø—ã—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã —Å Docker, Git

–°—Ç–µ–∫ –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–∞:

- –±—ç–∫—ç–Ω–¥ –Ω–∞ Django/Postgresql/Redis/Celery/RabbitMQ; 
- NginX, kubernetes

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: —Ç–µ–ª–µ–≥—Ä–∞–º @victoriashrv –∏/–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—á—Ç—É vicsukhareva@yandex.ru (–ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥—ã–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ä–µ–∑—é–º–µ –∏–ª–∏ —Å–æ–ø—Ä–æ–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –ø–∏—Å—å–º–æ)

node.title: Devops engineer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #vacancy #job #Belarus #Russsia #Ukraine #office #remote #fulltime #flexible #devops #aws #docker  #kubernetes #terraform
Position - DevOps Engineer
Company - Sphere Software
Location - Belarus, Russia, Ukraine
Work - Remote or Office, Full-time
Salary - 3700$ - 4800$ gross (3500$-4500$ nett)

Sphere Software is  partnered innovative trading platform with post-trade settlement and payments system and looking for DevOps engineer. 

Requirements:
üîπ 5+ years of experience as an SRE, DevOps engineer, operations engineer or similar
üîπ Expert at Linux system administration
üîπ Deep understanding of AWS technologies  
üîπ Experience using IaC tools such as Ansible or Terraform 
üîπ Hands-on experience using Docker, AWS ECS or other orchestration tools
üîπ Experience with bare metal infrastructures preferred
üîπ Proficient in Python or alternative scripting language 
üîπ Experience managing a metrics driven system infrastructure
üîπ Familiarity and hands on experience with common CI/CD pipeline tools (we use Jenkins) and container technologies
üîπ Experience using Hashicorp Vault and Consul (big plus)
üîπ Knowledge of cybersecurity mitigation and best practice (big plus)
üîπ Relevant experience from an exchange, proprietary trading firm or top tier bank (big plus) 
 
Responsibilities include but are not limited to:
üîπ Maintain and improve upon the uptime reliability of the overall platform 
üîπ Investigation and handling of issues in all public environments 
üîπ Designing automation tools and improving upon our deployment and release pipeline 
üîπ Build monitoring and alerting tools to keep internal teams and external stakeholders informed about system health and platform viability
üîπ Identify and advocate for changes vital to the stability and supportability of the system
üîπ Support the growth and scale of our infrastructure by suggesting and implementing new technology architecture
 
On-site benefits:
üîπ Competitive compensation and paid time off
üîπ Team of professionals providing you with the opportunity to grow
üîπ Sports compensation
üîπ Team building events.

Feel free to contact me for more info! üëã  @alex_ithr

‚Äî

üëâ –û–±—Å—É–∂–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏–∏ –≤ —á–∞—Ç–µ @devops_jobs

node.title: Devops engineer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #devops #azure #remote #—Å–ø–± #fulltime #—Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è 

Senior DevOps Remote Engineer (Azure)

City: Saint-Petersburg, metro Mayakovskaya | Chernyshevskaya 
Format: office or remote (both are possible)
Salary: ‚ÇΩ220-300k

Project: We are BeKitzur and now we are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer to support and drive innovative collaboration software products used by dozens of thousands of clients across the world. 
The platform is an Azure-hosted solution and offers you a great opportunity in driving state-of-the-art CI/CD, security, monitoring and DB management. This is a great position for an energetic and ambitious professional to get to the next career step and become a member of a stable and growing international company.

Responsibilities:
üîπSet up the best monitoring ever - unified, transparent and flexible
üîπImprove our CI/CD process and automation to deliver faster, more frequent and reliable releases
üîπMigrate databases to more secure and powerful clusters
üîπMigrate applications to Kubernetes
üîπIncrease High-Availability and Reliability of applications and DB clusters
üîπOptimize Azure costs and design more cost-effective DevOps solutions
üîπImprove the existing DevOps processes and technologies, such as CI/CD, monitoring, logs aggregation, and security
üîπParticipate in all DevOps decisions together with Senior engineers and Tech leads
üîπDefine and implement the security architecture to ensure data security at rest and in transit, application security, key management, identity management, authentication, and authorization with OIDC and OAuth2, infrastructure security with Azure VNets, NSGs, UDR, etc.

Required Skills and Experience:
üîπ5 years of experience in IT with good knowledge in Linux
üîπExperience in maintaining a production data processing system
üîπHands-on experience with git, Jenkins, Docker, and MySQL
üîπAzure Networking - Azure Virtual Networks, ExpressRoute, NSG, App Service Environment
üîπAzure PAAS Services Security and Provisioning
üîπCloud Security - Azure Key Vault, HSTS, SSL/TLS Ingress Control
üîπCloud monitoring - Experience with Azure Log Analytics, Azure Monitor, DataDog
üîπExperience with any configuration management tool (Ansible, Saltstack, Chef, Puppet, etc), Ansible preferred
üîπHands-on experience with cloud technologies (Azure in our case)
üîπBash and Python scripting skills
üîπGood written and spoken English

Benefits:
üîπExtremely interesting complex products
üîπThe most modern technology stack
üîπWonderful result-oriented team of senior professionals
üîπSupport for all your Cloud studies and certificates (you will have access and we will pay for exams)
üîπFriendly atmosphere
üîπCompetitive salary
üîπMedical insurance, sport, English classes in the office
üîπBusiness trips to the US (Silicon Valley)
üîπRelocation package to St.Petersburg
üîπOpportunity to build a career in a growing branch of the stable US company
üîπProfessional growth in the international business environment

üì©
–û—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–Ω—É—Ç—å—Å—è: @Khabibulin_it

‚Äî
